intro.title: No need to sacrifice high conversion rates for security, boost both
intro.description: Our 1-click, compliant & secure identity verification will unlock user value for all financial services by removing a substantial barrier to entry for new users and boosting privacy and trust for existing ones.

bullets.title: Banking
bullets.description:
Gone are the days where users have to fill in long forms & provide scans of ID documents to open a bank account. Enabling 1-click, KYC compliance user onboarding attracts new clients and accelerates your first point of sale.

  • Attract new clients
  • Become the most digitally advanced bank
  • Boost user experience & privacy

bullets.title: Crypto & DeFi platforms
bullets.description:
Inexperienced users hesitate to open crypto accounts or buy DeFi products due to tedious & time-consuming onboarding processes, often missing out on timely market opportunities. Leverage our SSI technology to offer users a seamless entry & navigation into the crypto space.

  • Offer a better gateway to your platform
  • Lower costs
  • Maintain the community's decentralized vision

bullets.title: Fintech
bullets.description:
Fintechs pioneered 'banking from everywhere' with quick digital onboarding, yet compliance rules and cyber threats often challenge your user experience vision. Not anymore. Our 1-click, KYC compliant onboarding & authentication tools help you secure and streamline in-app transactions, increase user privacy, and reduce fake operations.

  • Lower costs
  • Secure all transactions
  • Beat your competitors to the innovation race

firstSection.title: Financial services have never been easier to access

items.title: Fast & simple implementation
items.description: Start playing with verifiable credentials quickly with our low-code cloud platform, or ask for our on-premise solutions for strategic partners.

items.title: Flexible & easy-to-use tool
items.description: Our intuitive interface helps you easily navigate the world of verifiable credential issuances and verifications and customize it to your needs.

items.title: Compliant
items.description: Our technology includes GDPR by design, SSI eIDAS bridge, and is integrated with EBSI, the European Blockchain Services Infrastructure.

items.title: Secure & privacy-preserving
items.description: Users always control their data, so you don't have to. Our platform includes the highest level of security and privacy protocols to ensure the best experience for you and your clients.
